Header: A Chinese Delegation meets the Prime Minister
Content: Director General of the Asian Region of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs in China Wu Jianghaomet Prime Minister Mahinda Rajapakse at the Temple Trees.Wu Jianghao was a former Ambassador to Sri Lanka.
